name: CIQRCodeDescriptor
desc: A concrete subclass of CIBarcodeDescriptor that represents a square QR code symbol.

items.name: init?(payload: Data, symbolVersion: Int, maskPattern: UInt8, errorCorrectionLevel: CIQRCodeDescriptor.ErrorCorrectionLevel)
items.desc: Initializes a descriptor that can be used as input to the CIBarcodeGenerator filter.

items.name: var errorCorrectedPayload: Data
items.desc: The error-corrected payload containing the data encoded in the QR code.

items.name: var symbolVersion: Int
items.desc: The version of the QR code.

items.name: var errorCorrectionLevel: CIQRCodeDescriptor.ErrorCorrectionLevel
items.desc: The QR code error correction level.

items.name: enum CIQRCodeDescriptor.ErrorCorrectionLevel
items.desc: Constants that indicate the percentage of the symbol dedicated to error correction.
